java/liquibase/database/sql/DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.MaxDBDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00007 
00008 public class DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement implements SqlStatement {
00009 
00010     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00011     private String baseTableName;
00012     private String constraintName;
00013 
00014     public DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement(String baseTableSchemaName, String baseTableName, String constraintName) {
00015         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00016         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00017         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00021         return baseTableSchemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getBaseTableName() {
00025         return baseTableName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getConstraintName() {
00029         return constraintName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00033         if (getBaseTableSchemaName() != null && !database.supportsSchemas()) {
00034             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support schemas", this, database);
00035         }
00036         
00037         if (database instanceof MySQLDatabase || database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00038             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getBaseTableSchemaName(), getBaseTableName()) + " DROP FOREIGN KEY " + getConstraintName();
00039         } else {
00040             return "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getBaseTableSchemaName(), getBaseTableName()) + " DROP CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName();
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00045         return ";";
00046     }
00047 
00048     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00049         return true;
00050     }
00051 }
